entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trois-Pistoles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
